sense.def:
The reception
je prostor v hotelu, uradu ali bolnišnici, kjer se obiskovalci lahko najavijo za obisk ali pogovor ter dobijo različne podatke.

A reception
je slavnostna družabna prireditev, prirejena v čast določene osebe ali dogodka.

seg.quote: The reception was held in the Albany.

sense.def:
To have a particular kind of reception
pomeni doživeti določene vrste odziv pri drugih.

seg.quote: I wrote to George about the enthusiastic reception of his book.
Butler received a hostile reception in Bristol.

sense.def:
The reception of guests
je slovesen pozdrav, s katerim sprejmemo goste;

seg.quote: ...a room which was kept for the reception of visitors.

sense.def:
To get good reception from one's radio or television
pomeni, da sta zvok in slika čista.
